GSD.product_version: versions from v3.2 to before v5.10.166
GSD.description:
i2c: designware: use casting of u64 in clock multiplication to avoid overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.166 by commit ed173f77fd28a3e4fffc13b3f28687b9eba61157, it was introduced in version v3.2 by commit 2373f6b9744d5373b886f3ce1a985193cca0a356. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: i2c: designware: use casting of u64 in clock multiplication to avoid overflow
